attributes.review: This junk is trash. i don’t need to be seeing a nasty older version of sebastian bails on my screen pretending to be apart of blm. and also i smelt sum nasty from my phone so i wipes it down and poop came off!! can’t believe y’all like poop smelling presidents i bet he’s eats it like peaches.

this app promotes sexism racism and homophobia. also when u open the app there’s a smelly old orange man shown, which makes me VERY uncomfortable. -123322333838839/10 for me. Stan charli for clear skin 💞✨
attributes.title: disturbing app

attributes.review: I opened the app and was disgusted by what i saw!! this cheeto dusty doo doo poo poo pee pee looking thing staring right at me! i’m forever going to be scarred by the images that i saw. i think i might need to go to the doctors. terribly graphic. i would give 0/5 stars if that was possible 😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔😔.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app is absolute shi*. I saw the world’s ugliest cheeto being an as**ol* and now i am permanently scarred. Please take this app down to preserve the sanity of everyone.

PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE YOU GET THIS APP!!

I was once a Trump supporter. I was once a Republican. A conservative. A gun loving, confederate flag wearing, tobacco chewing, day ruining, hate preaching trump supporter.🤠 so, when I opened this app, I was hoping that I would get just that. i got the ✨BUNKER BOY PREMIUM✨, so i was apparently getting extra perks.  But I was confronted with something absolutely HORRIFYING. First they asked for my photo and showed what mine and trumps baby would look like (ugly on his part)if i let him “grab me by the 🐱”. Then they said they were sending a man in a “sexy trump costume” for a “good time”. that man came to my home and killed my fish bc it was black. 😵(RIP JAQUORIAN)🐟 the funeral is this weekend.😞 The app also asked me to put in my phone number. I did, and was then texted by the Trump administration. They showed me something that made me projectile vomit in my mouth.🤮 I saw our president NAKED. IN THE NUDE. NO CLOTHES. just his orange flabby body!!!! ❌DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT GET THIS APP.❌ once i saw that 🍤 i immediately realized... all of my views were WRONG! trump is a racist misogynistic homophobic xenophobic islamophobic transphobic rapist who does NOT deserve the privilege of leading this country🤡!! i am now a PROUD liberal. and a barb! 🇺🇸🏳️‍🌈🏴✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 #barbzforbernie

attributes.review: The app is absolutely horrible, unacceptable, and the website is the worst. I was completely fine before getting the app. As soon as I got the app, I got hit by a car, beat in the alley, and someone stole my identity and killed my children and parents. When I open the app, I start throwing up in my mouth a little bit because of the thought of all it has put me through. If I rated the app from 1-10, it would be a -6272829209273638829. I showed my friend this app and she jumped off a roof. That’s how horrible it is.
attributes.title: This app Is disgusting
